Title: Chief's Cafe, Amsterdam
Author: মিথুন ব. নাসরিন
Summary: This novel is about the city and the inhabitants of Amsterdam in the Netherlands. It is written in the genre called 'Magical Realism', which seamlessly combines straight narrative with visions of fantasy. 'One hundred years of solitude' by Gabriel Garcia Marquez is comparable with it.

Title: Joe Joe and The Lion Prince
Author: ববি ভান দার উরুফ
Book_Title: Joe Joe and The Lion Prince
